# ggsimplestats

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/maximilian-heeg/ggsimplestats/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/maximilian-heeg/ggsimplestats/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ggsimplestats is to provide an easy interface to add statistics to boxplot 
created with ggplot2

## Installation

``` r
# FILL THIS IN! HOW CAN PEOPLE INSTALL YOUR DEV PACKAGE?
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggsimplestats)
ggplot(mpg, aes(class, cty)) +
  geom_boxplot()  +
  stat_kwAllPairsDunnTest()
```
